title: card.wireless.penalty Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Response containing penalty box status information, including failure counts, duration, and current penalty conditions from the Notecard.

minutes.description: The time since the first network registration failure.

count.description: The number of consecutive network registration failures.

status.description: If the Notecard is in a [Penalty Box](https://dev.blues.io/guides-and-tutorials/notecard-guides/understanding-notecard-penalty-boxes/), this field provides the associated [Error and Status Codes](https://dev.blues.io/notecard/notecard-walkthrough/notecard-error-and-status-codes/).

seconds.description: If the Notecard is in a [Penalty Box](https://dev.blues.io/guides-and-tutorials/notecard-guides/understanding-notecard-penalty-boxes/), the number of seconds until the penalty condition ends.

samples.title: Active Penalty Box Status
samples.description: Example response showing Notecard in penalty box with active network registration failure.

samples.title: No Active Penalty
samples.description: Example response when Notecard is not in a penalty box.

samples.title: Partial Penalty Information
samples.description: Example response with basic penalty metrics without active penalty.
